For details see accompanying license terms. */

/** * An Action that acts on on the current View of an * Application. * If the current View object is disabled or is null, the * AbstractViewAction is disabled as well. *

* A property name can be specified. When the specified property * changes or when the current view changes, method updateView * is invoked. * * @author Werner Randelshofer * @version 1.0 October 9, 2005 Created. * @see org.jhotdraw.app.View * @see org.jhotdraw.app.Application */
